lead_paragraph: Evgeni Malkin scored two goals and the Pittsburgh Penguins took advantage of a couple of defensive lapses by New Jersey in posting a 6-1 victory over the Devils on Sunday night.

headline.print_headline: Malkin Scores Two Goals as Penguins Beat Devils
headline.main: Malkin Scores Two Goals as Penguins Beat Devils

snippet: Evgeni Malkin scored two goals and the Pittsburgh Penguins took advantage of a couple of defensive lapses by New Jersey in posting a 6-1 victory over the Devils on Sunday night....
